resources.string: Crashlytics helps us to analyse any misbehaviour in this application due to a crash. Only crash data will be sent to us.
Analytics helps us to process some metrics that will help to improve this application. There will be no personal data collected at all!! Read privacy policy for more info.

This is completely free 🎉app & will remain so forever 😎. It is a very humble request that you please rate ⭐this application positively on play store so it can reach more users & hold a good ratings🥇 on play store. For past 6 months Wallup took a real toll on the ratings & apparently no of users/downloads 😢. It will only take 1 min of your time but will mean a lot to me . Thank you 🤗
